text:
Romeo: I don’t really know how to tell you who I am.
If I could choose I would change my identity.
Juliet: Hey, I remember you, aren’t you that Romeo guy?
Romeo: Depends. Do you like Romeo?
Juliet: How did you get here? You must be good at parkour to get over our walls.
Romeo: I got over these walls not because of my insane parkour skills (which I do have regardless) but because of my love for you. *Muttering* gosh that sounded cheesey.
Romeo starts climbing up
Juliet: My family will kill you if they see you. Like literally kill you. Like LITERALLY KILL YOU.
Romeo: I care far more about you. If you hate me, that would be far more deadly than any of your family’s weapons. *Muttering* gosh, that was really cheesey
Juliet: I’d give the world to make sure they do not see you here.
Romeo: Don’t worry about it. All I care about is if you love me.
Juliet: Who told you where my bedroom was? Little creepy, eh?
